title: Licensee liability
context: [ยง489D-13] Licensee liability. A licensee&rsquo;s responsibility to any person for a money transmission conducted on that person&rsquo;s behalf by the licensee or the licensee&rsquo;s authorized delegate shall be limited to the amount of money transmitted, the face amount, or the purchase amount of the payment instrument. [L 2006, c 153, pt of ยง1]
